All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    DatabaseInit
    Class used to initialize the database connection and create tables
    DiacriticsCRUD
    Class used for implementation of CRUD methods for Diacritics table
    DiacriticsEntity
    Class used to describe content of Diacritics table
    DiacriticsEntityPK
    Class used to describe content of Diacritics primary key
    InfoCRUD
    Class used for implementation of CRUD methods for Info table
    InfoEntity
    Class used to describe content of Info table
    InputServlet
    The main class of the servlet that handles input given by user - if there was no such - exception is thrown otherwise, calculations proceed
    LastCharCRUD
    Class used for implementation of CRUD methods for LastChar table
    LastCharEntity
    Class used to describe content of LastChar table
    Model
    Class containing all the fields and methods needed for text to be analyzed.
    ModelTest
    Class for running tests on Text class' methods.
    NoInputTextException
    Exception class for no input text given by user.
    PalindromesCRUD
    Class used for implementation of CRUD methods for Palindromes table
    PalindromesEntity
    Class used to describe content of Palindromes table
    PalindromesEntityPK
    Class used to describe content of Palindromes primary key
    ResultServlet
    The main class of the servlet that handles printing out results of the text analysis given in collections - if the session is valid otherwise, the index page is opened
    ResultServlet.Statistics
    Specification of the lambda expression with two parameters using interface
    TextsCRUD
    Class used for implementation of CRUD methods for Texts table
    TextsEntity
    Class used to describe content of Texts table
    UTF8Filter
    Filter used to set the character encoding as UTF-8.
    WordsCRUD
    Class used for implementation of CRUD methods for Words table
    WordsEntity
    Class used to describe content of Words table
    WordsEntityPK
    Class used to describe content of Words primary key
